name: Oh My Game Boy
description:
🕹Damn, I need to occupy myself during the quarantine period!

I started by creating a responsive cartridge, then a screen, just for fun. Before publishing I saw Rogie's Smart Animate Gameboy, so I made a remix of it! 

Feel free to use as template, make your original.

I made the font, it's still work in progress but you can duplicate it here: 
https://www.figma.com/community/file/827837094942918541/%F0%9F%94%A2-SUM%C2%B70-Font

Have fun!

April 2020, Benjamin Calméjane aka @Ben_cmjn on twitter, instagram, and… Figma
